PersonalStatement.text: Kyle Frazier, born on 1974-04-27, is a Male based in Meganborough, Madagascar. He is Married and holds Paraguayan nationality. Currently working at Wallace-Webster.

WorkExperience.text: HR Manager at White-Jones from 2014 to 2017.
Senior HR Manager at Wallace-Webster, 2019 to present.

EducationAndTraining.text: Master's in Business Administration from Chulalongkorn University
Master's in Engineering from Universidade Federal do Rio Grande Do Norte

PersonalSkills.text: Problem-solving: Skilled in troubleshooting and optimizing complex systems.
Communication: Strong ability to present technical information to non-technical stakeholders.

Hobbies.text: In their free time, he enjoys reading.
